meanings.definition: At an indefinite time in the future.
meanings.sent1: We will visit the zoo someday.
meanings.sent2: I hope to travel the world someday.
meanings.sent3: Maybe someday we'll discover a hidden treasure in our backyard.
meanings.sent4: Like a whisper carried by the wind, someday our dreams will come true.
meanings.sent5: The promise of a better tomorrow shines brightly in the word 'someday'.

meanings.definition: At some time in the future.
meanings.sent1: Someday, I will learn to play the guitar.
meanings.sent2: She dreams of owning a beach house someday.
meanings.sent3: Someday, the cat might actually catch the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, someday blooms like a delicate flower.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of what lies ahead is captured in the word 'someday'.
